      • getServerPublicKey

        public static byte[] getServerPublicKey()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        A public static method for getting server public key

        Gets the server public key by sending GET request to the server

        Returns:
        returns the server public key as byte arrays
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception on con.getInputStream() method. Occurs when server is down.

      • post

        public static com.google.gson.JsonObject post(java.lang.String url,
                                              java.lang.String data,
                                              byte[] serverPublicKey,
                                              java.security.KeyPair clientKey)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        a public static method for POST HTTP requests
        Parameters:
        url - the url you want to send POST
        data - the data you want to send to the desired url
        serverPublicKey - the server public key
        clientKey - the client key
        Returns:
        returns the POST request result as a JsonObject
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception occurs when server is down

      • get

        public static com.google.gson.JsonObject get(java.lang.String url,
                                             java.lang.String parameter)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        A public static method for GET HTTP requests
        Parameters:
        url - the url you want to GET from
        parameter - the parameters you enter to send GET requests
        Returns:
        returns the GET result as a JsonObject
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception on HttpURLConnection openConnection method. Exception occurs when server is down
